title: [Large-scale] Civic Competency Enhancement Program for Patient Safety

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental medical terminology and safety management experience in daily life
context.additional_context: Basic patient safety principles education for general citizens, aimed at promoting community health culture

learning_goals: Learners can explain five core principles of patient safety (infection control, medication error prevention, etc.).
Learners can identify at least three patient safety risk factors in everyday life scenarios.
Learners can propose two practical measures to enhance patient safety in the community.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
